radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Even distribution of radioactive seeds throughout the prostate; no evidence of metastases.
Abnormal signal in the prostate and right seminal vesicle, with bulging of the prostate capsule of the right lobe; features suggestive of postradiation changes.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Cancer involving the prostate and right seminal vesicle could not be ruled out.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis with contrast

radiographic_examinations.findings: Heterogeneity of signal intensity within the gland; loss of normally high signal intensity in the right seminal vesicle compared to the left, raising suspicion for recurrent prostate cancer.
